alert.note: Alert for Gregg; Rusk (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 03 at 3:45PM CDT until June 03 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Rusk County in northeastern Texas... South central Gregg County in northeastern Texas... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 345 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Joinerville, or 7 miles northwest of Henderson, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Longview, Henderson, Kilgore, Overton, New London, Joinerville, Rolling Meadows, Monroe, Laird Hill and Oak Hill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
